children.text: Flexbox revolutionized how we create flexible, responsive layouts. It excels at distributing space in one dimension

children.text: CSS Grid takes layout to the next level by enabling two-dimensional control over both rows and columns

rects.text: CSS Grid takes layout to the next level by enabling two-dimensional control over both rows and columns

children.text: While Flexbox is ideal for one-dimensional layouts like navigation bars or button groups, Grid shines when you need
